question: Who are the 5 defensive midfielders with the highest pass completion rate, taller than 180 cm, and worth under 2 million euros?
expected_players: Julian Weigl, Rodrigo Hernández Cascante, José Vicente Gómez Umpiérrez, Seydou Keita, Joan Jordán Moreno
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.height_cm, p.value_eur, s.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'defensive midfield'
  AND p.height_cm > 180
  AND p.value_eur < 2000000
ORDER BY s.pass_completion_rate DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 5 center midfielders under 26 with the highest progressive carries per 90 minutes.
expected_players: László Kleinheisler, Panagiotis Giorgios Kone, Cameron Brannagan, İlkay Gündoğan, Panagiotis Tachtsidis
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.progressive_carries_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND p.age < 26
ORDER BY s.progressive_carries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me the 5 strikers with the most non-blocked shots per 90 minutes and a value below 10 million euros.
expected_players: Marcello Trotta, Nikica Jelavić, Francesco Totti, Florian Niederlechner, Alberto Mateus Contreiras Gonçalves
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.value_eur, s.non_blocked_shots_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
  AND p.value_eur < 10000000
ORDER BY s.non_blocked_shots_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me the 5 center backs with the highest number of ball recoveries per 90 minutes, aged 28 or older.
expected_players: Medhi Amine El Mouttaqi Benatia, Dario Dainelli, Giovanni Marchese, Vasyl Pryyma, João Miranda de Souza Filho
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.ball_recoveries_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center back'
  AND p.age >= 28
ORDER BY s.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find the top 5 offensive midfielders with the most chances created per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Alexander Baumjohann, Miloš Jojić, Kevin-Prince Boateng, Mesut Özil, Allan Saint-Maximin
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.chances_created_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
ORDER BY s.chances_created_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 5 side backs under 25 years old with the highest number of crosses per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Federico Mattiello, Davide Zappacosta, Kieran Trippier, Gilberto Moraes Junior, Alex Sandro Lobo Silva
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.crosses_total_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'side back'
  AND p.age < 25
ORDER BY s.crosses_total_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find the top 5 goalkeepers with the highest save percentage, considering only those who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Jan Oblak, Gianluigi Buffon, Claudio Andrés Bravo Muñoz, Manuel Neuer, Koen Casteels
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.save_percentage
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'goalkeeper'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.save_percentage DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: List the top 5 wingers with the highest shot accuracy, who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Gerard Deulofeu Lázaro, Andros Townsend, Wayne Routledge, Aaron Lennon, Lucas Vázquez Iglesias
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 4 attacking midfielders under 24 years old with the highest number of key passes per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).
expected_players: Hiroshi Kiyotake, Nadiem Amiri, Riccardo Saponara, Marco Asensio Willemsen
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC
LIMIT 4;

question: Find 6 central midfielders with the highest number of progressive passes completed per 90 and key passes per 90, who have played more than 850 minutes.
expected_players: Andrés Iniesta Luján, Thiago Alcântara do Nascimento, İlkay Gündoğan, Michael Carrick, Luka Modrić, Marcelo Brozović
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.progressive_passes_completed_per90, s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.progressive_passes_completed_per90 DESC, s.key_passes_per90 DESC
LIMIT 6;

question: Give me 3 strikers under 25 years old with the highest number of goals per 90 and the best shot accuracy, who have played more than 850 minutes.

sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.goals_scored_per90, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
  AND p.age < 25
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.goals_scored_per90 DESC, s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Find 4 center backs worth less than 4 million euros with the highest number of interceptions and clearances per 90 minutes (only players with more than 850 minutes played).

WHERE p.main_position = 'center back'
  AND p.value_eur < 4000000
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.interceptions_per90 DESC, s.clearances_per90 DESC
LIMIT 4;

question: List 5 side backs who have completed the most progressive carries and dribbles per 90 minutes, with more than 850 minutes played.

WHERE p.main_position = 'side back'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850

LIMIT 5;

question: Find 3 wingers under 24 years old, valued under 6 million euros, who have the highest number of progressive carries, key passes, and shot accuracy per 90 minutes. Only include players with more than 850 minutes played.
expected_players: Jordon Ibe, Andros Townsend, Carlos Joaquín Correa
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, p.value_eur,
       s.progressive_carries_per90, s.key_passes_per90, s.shot_accuracy
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND p.value_eur < 6000000
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.progressive_carries_per90 DESC,
         s.key_passes_per90 DESC,
         s.shot_accuracy DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Find 4 defensive midfielders with the highest duel success rate and the lowest number of fouls committed per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).

sql:

WHERE p.main_position = 'defensive midfield'

ORDER BY s.duel_success_rate DESC, s.fouls_committed_per90 ASC

question: Show me 5 goalkeepers under 24 years old with the highest penalty save percentage and total saves per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).

question: Find 3 center midfielders under 26 years old, with more than 850 minutes played, who rank highest in progressive passes completed, goal assists, ball recoveries per 90, and who also commit fewer than 1.5 fouls per 90.
expected_players: İlkay Gündoğan, James David Rodríguez Rubio, Pascal Groß
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.progressive_passes_completed_per90,
       s.goal_assists_per90, s.ball_recoveries_per90, s.fouls_committed_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND p.age < 26
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
  AND s.fouls_committed_per90 < 1.5
ORDER BY s.progressive_passes_completed_per90 DESC,
         s.goal_assists_per90 DESC,
         s.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: Show me the 5 most valuable players from Valencia with the highest number of key passes per 90 minutes (minimum 850 minutes played).
expected_players: Sofiane Feghouli, Rodrigo Moreno Machado, Daniel Parejo Muñoz, Álvaro Negredo Sánchez, Francisco Alcácer García
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.value_eur,
       s.key_passes_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE t.team = 'Valencia'
  AND s.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC, p.value_eur DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the top 5 rated players from Athletic Club, excluding those without a valid rating.
expected_players: Íñigo Lekue Martínez, Beñat Etxebarria Urkiaga, Iñaki Williams Arthuer, Gorka Iraizoz Moreno, Óscar de Marcos Arana
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.rating
FROM player_profile p
JOIN teams t ON p.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE t.team = 'Athletic Club'
  AND p.rating ~ '^[0-9]+(\.[0-9]+)?$'
ORDER BY CAST(p.rating AS FLOAT) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the profile of Iñaki Williams Arthuer, including his position, age, minutes played and goals per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Iñaki Williams Arthuer
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.minutes_played, s.goals_scored_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.player_name = 'Iñaki Williams Arthuer';

question: Give me Lionel Messi’s age, position, number of key passes per 90 minutes and goals scored per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, 
       s.key_passes_per90, s.goals_scored_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.player_name = 'Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini';

question: What is the age, position, shot accuracy and non-blocked shots per 90 minutes of Robert Lewandowski?
expected_players: Robert Lewandowski
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, 
       s.shot_accuracy, s.non_blocked_shots_per90
FROM player_profile p

WHERE p.player_name = 'Robert Lewandowski';

question: Show me the offensive midfielders under 24 years old, with a value below 3 million euros, who have the most key passes per 90 and chances created per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Allan Saint-Maximin, Hiroshi Kiyotake, Kevin Lasagna, Nadiem Amiri, Marco Jhonfai Fabián De La Mora
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, p.value_eur,
       s.key_passes_per90, s.chances_created_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
  AND p.age < 24
  AND p.value_eur < 3000000
ORDER BY s.key_passes_per90 DESC, s.chances_created_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me the 5 defensive midfielders under 24 years old who have played more than 1000 minutes.
expected_players: Eric Dier, Fernando Lucas Martins, Gonzalo Escalante, Jorge Luiz Frello Filho, Amadou Diawara
sql_query:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name, 
    pp.main_position, 
    pp.age, 
    ps.minutes_played
FROM 
    player_profile pp
JOIN 
    player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
WHERE 
    pp.main_position = 'defensive midfield' 
    AND pp.age < 24 
    AND ps.minutes_played > 1000
ORDER BY 
    ps.minutes_played DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Who are the 5 side backs with the most ball recoveries per 90?
expected_players: Fabio Daprelà, Gilberto Moraes Junior, Robert Kenedy Nunes do Nascimento, Wallace Oliveira dos Santos, Emiliano Buendía
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.ball_recoveries_per90
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'side back'
ORDER BY ps.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: List 5 center midfielders with at least 0.25 goal assists per 90 and a pass completion rate over 85%.
expected_players: Johannes Flum, Kevin Strootman, Panagiotis Giorgios Kone, James David Rodríguez Rubio, James Philip Milner
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.goal_assists_per90,
    ps.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND ps.goal_assists_per90 >= 0.25
  AND ps.pass_completion_rate > 0.85
ORDER BY ps.goal_assists_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Who are the 5 center backs with the highest number of clearances per 90?
expected_players: Steven Caulker, Marc Wilson, Calum Chambers, James Collins, David Kinsombi
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.clearances_per90
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'center back'
ORDER BY ps.clearances_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 5 strikers under 24 years old with at least 0.4 goals per 90, a shot accuracy above 50%, and fewer than 1 foul committed per 90.
expected_players: Paulo Bruno Exequiel Dybala, Francisco Alcácer García, Bertrand Isidore Traoré, Romelu Lukaku Menama, Mauro Emanuel Icardi Rivero
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.goals_scored_per90,
    ps.shot_accuracy,
    ps.fouls_committed_per90
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'striker'
  AND pp.age < 24
  AND ps.goals_scored_per90 >= 0.4
  AND ps.shot_accuracy > 0.5
  AND ps.fouls_committed_per90 < 1
ORDER BY ps.goals_scored_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Which 5 offensive midfielders complete the most progressive passes and carries per 90, while also having a pass completion rate over 80%?
expected_players: Alexander Baumjohann, Allan Saint-Maximin, Miloš Jojić, Jonhatan Montiel Caballero, Jack Wilshere
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.progressive_passes_completed_per90,
    ps.progressive_carries_per90,
    ps.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
  AND ps.pass_completion_rate > 0.80
ORDER BY 
    (ps.progressive_passes_completed_per90 + ps.progressive_carries_per90) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find 5 defensive midfielders with at least 8 ball recoveries per 90, more than 40 total passes per 90, and fewer than 0.5 yellow cards per 90.
expected_players: Bryan Cristante, Borja Fernández Fernández, Alexandre Dimitri Song-Billong, Raffaele Maiello, Rachid Aït-Atmane
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.ball_recoveries_per90,
    ps.total_passes_per90,
    ps.yellow_cards_per90
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'defensive midfield'
  AND ps.ball_recoveries_per90 >= 8
  AND ps.total_passes_per90 > 40
  AND ps.yellow_cards_per90 < 0.5
ORDER BY ps.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me 5 strikers with more than 0.4 goals per 90, a market value under 2 million euros, and more than 850 minutes played.
expected_players: Jamie Vardy, Alfreð Finnbogason, Sandro Wagner, Sergio Pellissier, Marco Borriello
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.goals_scored_per90,
    ps.minutes_played
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'striker'
  AND ps.goals_scored_per90 > 0.4
  AND pp.value_eur < 2000000
  AND ps.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY ps.goals_scored_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find 5 wingers with more than 1.5 successful dribbles per 90, at least 0.2 assists per 90, and fewer than 1.5 total shots per 90.
expected_players: Jonathan Leko, Jonás Manuel Gutiérrez, Vadis Odjidja-Ofoe, Oluwaseyi Babajide Ojo, Joaquín Sánchez Rodríguez
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.dribbles_completed_per90,
    ps.goal_assists_per90,
    ps.shots_total_per90
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'winger'
  AND ps.dribbles_completed_per90 > 1.5
  AND ps.goal_assists_per90 >= 0.2
  AND ps.shots_total_per90 < 1.5
ORDER BY ps.dribbles_completed_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Find 5 center midfielders with more than 1.5 progressive carries per 90, over 4 completed progressive passes per 90, and more than 850 minutes played.

    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.progressive_carries_per90,
    ps.progressive_passes_completed_per90,

FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'center midfield'
  AND ps.progressive_carries_per90 > 1.5
  AND ps.progressive_passes_completed_per90 > 4
  AND ps.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY (ps.progressive_carries_per90 + ps.progressive_passes_completed_per90) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me 5 side backs with more than 7 pressures per 90, at least 6 ball recoveries per 90, and more than 850 minutes played.

JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position = 'side back'
  AND ps.pressures_per90 > 7
  AND ps.ball_recoveries_per90 >= 6
  AND ps.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY (ps.pressures_per90 + ps.ball_recoveries_per90) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Show me 3 center backs with more than 1 progressive carry per 90, more than 850 minutes played, and at least 4 clearances per 90.

sql:

  AND ps.clearances_per90 >= 4

LIMIT 3;

question: Show me 3 wingers with more than 1.5 tackles won per 90, more than 5 pressures per 90, and more than 850 minutes played.

question: Show me 3 strikers with at least 0.25 goal assists per 90, fewer than 1.5 total shots per 90, and more than 850 minutes played.

question: Find 5 offensive midfielders or wingers with at least 2.5 chances created per 90, a final third pass accuracy over 70%, and more than 850 minutes played.
expected_players: Mesut Özil, Dimitri Payet, Sérgio Paulo Barbosa Valente, Kevin De Bruyne, Adem Ljajić
sql:
SELECT 
    pp.player_name,
    t.team,
    pp.value_eur,
    ps.chances_created_per90,
    ps.passes_final_third_accuracy,
    ps.minutes_played
FROM player_profile pp
JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id
WHERE pp.main_position IN ('offensive midfield', 'winger')
  AND ps.chances_created_per90 >= 2.5
  AND ps.passes_final_third_accuracy > 0.7
  AND ps.minutes_played > 850
ORDER BY ps.chances_created_per90 DESC
LIMIT 5;

JOIN player_stats ps ON pp.player_id = ps.player_id
JOIN teams t ON pp.team_id = t.team_id

  AND ps.yellow_cards_per90 < 0.2

LIMIT 5;

expected_players: Johannes Flum, Kevin Strootman
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.goal_assists_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
ORDER BY s.goal_assists_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Which 2 goalkeepers act most as sweepers per 90 minutes?
expected_players: Iago Herrerín Buisán, Luca Lezzerini
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.keeper_sweeper_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'goalkeeper'
ORDER BY s.keeper_sweeper_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Find 2 strikers who win the most fouls per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Robbie Kruse, Radamel Falcao García Zárate
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.fouls_won_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
ORDER BY s.fouls_won_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Give me 2 side backs with the highest interception success rate.
expected_players: Luke Shaw, Mathieu Debuchy
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.interception_success_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'side back'
ORDER BY s.interception_success_rate DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Find 2 defensive midfielders with the highest number of ball recoveries per 90 minutes.
expected_players: Bryan Cristante, Eddy Silvestre Pascual İsrafilov
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.ball_recoveries_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'defensive midfield'
ORDER BY s.ball_recoveries_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Show me 2 offensive midfielders with the highest pass completion rate.
expected_players: Kevin Nolan, Jack Wilshere
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
ORDER BY s.pass_completion_rate DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Which 2 center backs block the most shots per 90 minutes?
expected_players: David Kinsombi, Calum Chambers
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.blocks_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center back'
ORDER BY s.blocks_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Find 2 wingers with the best dribble success rate.
expected_players: Gaël Kakuta, Miguel Arturo Layún Prado
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.dribble_success_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger'
ORDER BY s.dribble_success_rate DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Give me 2 strikers with the highest pass completion rate.
expected_players: Emmanuel Rivière, Alexandre Rodrigues da Silva
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'striker'
ORDER BY s.pass_completion_rate DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Show me 2 side backs who commit the fewest fouls per 90 minutes.
expected_players: José Joaquín Matos García, Manuel Pablo García Díaz
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.fouls_committed_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'side back'
ORDER BY s.fouls_committed_per90 ASC
LIMIT 2;

question: Which 2 center midfielders apply the most pressures per 90 minutes?
expected_players: Johannes Flum, Cameron Brannagan
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.pressures_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center midfield'
ORDER BY s.pressures_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Find 2 goalkeepers with the lowest save percentage.
expected_players: Iago Herrerín Buisán, Ádám Bogdán
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.save_percentage
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'goalkeeper'
ORDER BY s.save_percentage ASC
LIMIT 2;

question: Give me 2 offensive midfielders with the most dribbles completed per 90.
expected_players: Allan Saint-Maximin, Alexander Baumjohann
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.dribbles_completed_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'offensive midfield'
ORDER BY s.dribbles_completed_per90 DESC
LIMIT 2;

question: Who is the center back under 25 years old with the highest number of blocks per 90?
expected_players: David Kinsombi
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, p.age, s.blocks_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'center back' AND p.age < 25
ORDER BY s.blocks_per90 DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Find the winger with the highest dribbles completed per 90 and a pass completion rate above 80%.
expected_players: Lionel Andrés Messi Cuccittini
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.dribbles_completed_per90, s.pass_completion_rate
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'winger' AND s.pass_completion_rate > 80
ORDER BY s.dribbles_completed_per90 DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Show me the goalkeeper with the best save percentage who also has more than 1.5 sweeper actions per 90.
expected_players: Roman Weidenfeller
sql:
SELECT p.player_name, p.main_position, s.save_percentage, s.keeper_sweeper_per90
FROM player_profile p
JOIN player_stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id
WHERE p.main_position = 'goalkeeper' AND s.keeper_sweeper_per90 > 1.5
ORDER BY s.save_percentage DESC
LIMIT 1;
